mapper.select: SELECT order_id FROM order_info WHERE NOW() > DATE_ADD(create_time, INTERVAL 72 HOUR) AND order_status = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, (@row := @row + 1) AS row_num FROM (SELECT a.*, b.nickname, b.phone, b.openid, b.photo, c.shop_name, c.shop_address, c.shop_logo_url, @row := 0, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y年%m月%d日 %h:%i:%s') create_time_str FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN shop_info c ON a.shop_id = c.shop_id, member_info b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no
AND a.member_no = '${member_no}'
AND a.order_status IN (${order_status})
AND a.shop_id = '${shop_id}'
AND a.order_desc LIKE '%${order_desc}%'
AND a.order_type IN (${order_type})
AND a.pay_way ='${pay_way}'
AND ( a.sheng_code = '${area_code}' OR a.shi_code = '${area_code}' OR a.qu_code = '${area_code}' )
AND a.order_nickname LIKE '%${nickname}%'
AND b.member_no = '${order_memebr}'
AND a.server_member_no = '${server_member_no}'
AND a.shop_is_check = '${shop_id_check}'
AND a.server_member_is_check = '${server_member_is_check}'
ORDER BY create_time DESC ) a) a
WHERE row_num >= ${begin}
AND row_num <= ${end}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_info SET order_status = 3 WHERE NOW() > DATE_ADD(create_time, INTERVAL 72 HOUR) AND order_status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.nickname, d.nickname server_member, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y年%m月%d日 %h:%i:%s') create_time_str FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN member_info d ON a.server_member_no = d.member_no, shop_server b, member_info c WHERE a.member_no = c.member_no AND a.shop_server_id = b.shop_server_id AND a.order_id ='${order_id}'
